Generation V.Black: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
Generation V.White: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.
Generation V.Black 2: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.
Generation V.White 2: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

Generation VI.X: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
Generation VI.Y: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It’s more nimble than it looks, and it uses its speed to confound its enemies. It rapidly launches fireballs from both nostrils.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon is a ravenous glutton. It uses its excellent sense of smell to find food, then cooks it to a crisp before eating.

Generation V.Black: First partner Pokémon from Professor Juniper in Nuvema Town
Generation V.White: First partner Pokémon from Professor Juniper in Nuvema Town
Generation V.Black 2: First partner Pokémon from Bianca in Aspertia City
Generation V.White 2: First partner Pokémon from Bianca in Aspertia City

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Received from Professor Birch on Route 101 after completing the Delta Episode
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Received from Professor Birch on Route 101 after completing the Delta Episode

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Canyon Biome , Chargestone Cavern (after boosting biodiversity in the Canyon Biome)
